solution_line_template: The school has {initial_classes} x {students_per_class} = <<{initial_classes}*{students_per_class}={initial_students}>>{initial_students} students right now.
They have an additional {added_classes} x {students_per_class} = <<{added_classes}*{students_per_class}={added_students}>>{added_students} students after adding 5 more classes.
Therefore, Texas Integrated School will have a total of {initial_students}+{added_students}= <<{initial_students}+{added_students}={total_students}>>{total_students} students.
